description: Camellia sinensis, or tea, is an amazing plant species that has long been lauded for its health benefits. Tea has powerful antioxidants that can help prevent cell damage and protect against diseases such as cancer and heart disease. Tea is also packed with flavonoids that have anti-inflammatory properties and can reduce the risk of stroke. It's low in caffeine, so it won't give you the jitters, and there are tons of different flavours to choose from. From green to oolong to black, there's something for every palate. Tea is the perfect beverage â€” it tastes great and is good for you, too!
